synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Single crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) analysis reveals that ZnMOF-Solv crystallizes in the C2/c space group of the monoclinic system.

synthesis_conditions.activation_method: soaking in methanol for 12 h and followed by drying
synthesis_conditions.environmental_tolerance: high tolerance towards acidic and alkali environment

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: CoMOF-Solv is synthesized by changing Zn(NO3)2∙6H2O to Co(NO3)2∙6H2O. The PXRD result of CoMOF-Solv is nearly identical to the simulated data indicating that CoMOF-Solv is a pure phase and possesses the same 3D porous topology as ZnMOF-Solv.

synthesis_conditions.activation_method: soaked in methanol for 12 h and then dried
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: CoMOF does not emit fluorescence as Co2+ is reported to be an effective fluorescence quencher.
